Each player chooses an Asset they control.
Donate the Asset you control and possess the Asset you don't control.

Activate:

Name: Entropy Surge

Sacrifice an Asset: 
  Gain 1 Energy. 
  If that Asset is owned by the opponent gain 1 additional energy.
Flavor: everything dies eventually, but why wait?

Name: Rune of Unnatural Life
Effect:
Activate, Sacrifice ~: 
  Draw a card from your scrapyard then 
  discard a card.
Flavor: To go against the very fabric of reality must have high reward, for it has an excetionally high price

Name: Idle Hands
Effect:
3, Activate:

3, Sacrifice ~, Activate:

Name: Eye of Intent

1, Activate, Sacrifice ~: 
  Look at opponent's hand and choose an Spell from it. 
  They discard it.
Flavor: To gaze into another mind and erase a thought from it is a wonderful feeling, just not for them.

Purge all copies of a target card from your scrapyard.

Effect: Transmute target Asset into Junk

Search top 4 cards of your deck for a kit card and put into play. 
Put rest to the bottom of your library.

Name: Nanite Sabotage
Effect: Choose an Asset from opponent's hand and transform it into Junk
Flavor: Machines for the sole purpose of destroying their own kind. Truely made in their creator's image.

Name: Recombinant Replication
Effect:
Additional Cost - Purge 3 Assets from your scrapyard. 
Transmute target Asset you control into a copy of target Asset in your scrapyard.
Flavor: What has been made and lost can be made again

Discard 2:

Shuffle 3 Junk into your deck, Activate:

1, Activate:

  Put the rest in the same order.

  Transform ~ into AI02.

1, Activate:

X, Sacrifice ~:
